title: Algorithmic Portfolio Management
summary: A daily, serverless 10-strategy portfolio that delivers over 100% CAGR over 12+ years with a 3.58 Sharpe, ~50% lower max drawdown than SPY (-17% vs -34%).

title: ETF Signal Service
summary: Personal service that sends daily email reports with buy signals for long-term investing based on technical indicators.

title: TikTalk
summary: Full-stack web application that generates TikTok-styled educational videos after processing lecture videos or PDF notes.

title: Reactify
summary: Full-stack application that exports canvas designs as React components.

title: BoilerMarket
summary: Full-stack marketplace application for Purdue students.

title: Portfolio
summary: Personal portfolio website showcasing projects, blogs, and experience with a modern design.

title: BluMap
summary: Full-stack travel planning web application for organizing and sharing trip itineraries.

title: MyChessEngine
summary: Chess game application where players can play against AI using MinMax algorithm with alpha-beta pruning.

title: MyShell
summary: Custom shell implementation using YACC, LEX, and C++ that replicates UNIX shell functionality including piping, redirection, and background processes.

title: Portable Oxygen Concentrator (POC) Analysis
summary: Data analysis project using random forest and multivariate LSTM models to predict oxygen concentrator failure rate.

title: Healthcare Surgery Volume Forecasting
summary: Forecasting application for emergency-surgery volumes to help IU Health ensure smoother patient care operations.

title: Integration Testing for Point of Sale System
summary: High school internship project focused on integration testing of frontend website for point of sale system.
